Detailed Description

A singleton class that manages video information. It also allows you to set video options. To draw, use a Renderer class.

void jvgs::video::VideoManager::setVideoDefaults (   ) 
 

Sets a number of (good!) default flags. This includes blending mode, textures enabled, the correct projection matrix, the identity modelview matrix... for the full list, well, see the source code.

void jvgs::video::VideoManager::setVideoMode (  std::string  title  ) 
 

This will attempt to choose the best fitting video mode. Usually this is fullscreen, with the native screen resolution.

Parameters:
title Title to be fed to the window manager.
